resources.string: Ikheli le-computer ngalo isicelo iseva efakwe. IP noma FQDN.
Hlola internet uxhumano lwakho \n kanye nekheli leseva
Eish! Iseva ye ayiphenduli. Sicela uhlole uxhumano lwakho lwe-Inthanethi bese uzama futhi
Kuye akubanga kwiseva. Sicela uhlole internet lwakho uxhumano kanye nekheli leseva baqinisile
Se han recibido datos corruptos del servidor. Asegúrate de tener una buena conexion a Internet
Sekube elonakele iseva idatha. Qiniseka ukuthi une-inthanethi olukahle
Weqe sokuvala iseva. Hlola uxhumano lwakho uphinde uzame futhi
Connection wenqaba ngokuzama ukufinyelela umkhawulo samaphasiwedi ngalungile. Test ngaphakathi

Ukusetha ikheli leseva kufanele uye esigabeni Izilungiselelo / Amasethingi Server. 

 Kumele ufake noma ikheli le-IP computer iseva yakho (kungaba wahulumende nobe wangasese) noma FQDN nokulalela port. 
 In uma isiqondiso kunendingeko zomphakathi ukuvula emachwebeni olusetshenziswa isicelo kwi-router. UNero isebenzisa ezizenzakalelayo port 30500.

Public amakheli IP kushintsha njalo. Uma ungenalo domain yomphakathi angafinyelela isicelo besebenzisa FQDN computer iseva. \n\n NO-IP iyisevisi free ukuba kwakha FQDN yekhompyutha yakho bese ngokuzenzakalelayo ilungisa ikheli lasesizindeni se-intanethi umphakathi ezihlobene ne FQDN.

Isicelo uvumela ukufinyelela okusheshayo ngokusebenzisa isaziso yokuchukuluzwa imenyu okwehliswayo of kudivayisi yakho yeselula. Lesi saziso singathunyelwa amisiwe esigabeni Isethaphu / Isaziso. 

 A ubuncane value kulesi sigaba ukususa isaziso esiphikelelayo. 

 A value close ubuncane ukuthi isaziso kuzobonakala uma imenyu ibonakala. 
 The last isaziso uyohlale avele. 

 A value isilinganiso izoveza isicelo nge kuyintfo lesembili close kwezinye izihlelo zokusebenza. Na esiphezulu value uyokwenza isicelo njalo ngowokuqala ukuboniswa ngaphezu kwabo bonke abanye isicelo.

Emva ngokucindezela Susa ukufinyelela inkinobho iphasiwedi ukuze iseva isicelo uzocelwa. Okungukuthi, iphasiwedi isethwe ku-server ukufinyelela isicelo futhi wacela ukuba asuse ziyafana. Lokhu iphasiwedi kungashintshwa on the server. \n\n Ngemuva iqinisekiswe iseva uzoqala isula wonke amafayela akhethiwe. Ngaphambili they are bonke swe uyogcwala futhi isikhala kuyatholakala kwi computer ngeke sibe nalutho ngoba lokho awukwazi alulame ulwazi asusiwe. Intuthuko Endleleni Okwakuhlelwa Ngayo imigoqo uzokwazisa inqubo ngaso sonke isikhathi.

Emva ngokucindezela inkinobho yokuhlola iphasiwedi uxhumano ukufinyelela isicelo iseva ucelwa. \n Ithimba uthunyelwa iseva futhi uqinisekise ukuthi lilungile. Uma une uxhumano elibi yimuphi kulaba ababili, it uzozama ukwazisa imininingwane ngangokunokwenzeka.
